mapper.insert: insert into bbs_topic_info (topic_id, topic_is_check, topic_is_home, topic_is_home_end_time, topic_is_reply, topic_is_local_top, topic_is_local_top_end_time, topic_is_global_top, topic_is_global_top_end_time, topic_is_hot, topic_is_cream) values (#{topicId}, #{topicIsCheck}, #{topicIsHome}, #{topicIsHomeEndTime}, #{topicIsReply}, #{topicIsLocalTop}, #{topicIsLocalTopEndTime}, #{topicIsGlobalTop}, #{topicIsGlobalTopEndTime}, #{topicIsHot}, #{topicIsCream})
